protected  void StreamPipe.removeStreamSocket(StreamSocket sock)

 void RemoteExperimentBroadcaster.removeStreamSocket(StreamSocket sock)
          This method removes the stream socket to the remote experiment.
 void FilteringPool.removeStreamSocket(StreamSocket sock)
          If the event socket stops to read the in buffer and thus exits the loop it calls this method in order to remove the socket from the vector holding the client event sockets.
